## FieldTextInput class

Class for an editable text field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldTextInput extends Field 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [BORDERRADIUS](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.borderradius_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Pixel size of input border radius. Should match blocklyText's border-radius in CSS. |

|  [CURSOR](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.cursor_property.md) |  | string | Mouse cursor style when over the hotspot that initiates the editor. |
|  [fullBlockClickTarget\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.fullblockclicktarget__property.md) |  | boolean \| null | Whether the field should consider the whole parent block to be its click target. |
|  [htmlInput\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.htmlinput__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | HTMLInputElement \| null | The HTML input element. |
|  [isBeingEdited\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.isbeingedited__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | True if the field's value is currently being edited via the UI. |
|  [isDirty\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.isdirty__property.md) |  | any |  |
|  [isTextValid\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.istextvalid__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | True if the value currently displayed in the field's editory UI is valid. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.serializable_property.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. |
|  [spellcheck\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.spellcheck__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | boolean | Allow browser to spellcheck this field. |
|  [value\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.value__property.md) |  | any |  |
|  [workspace\_](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.workspace__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) \| null | The workspace that this field belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bindInputEvents\_(htmlInput)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.bindinputevents__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Bind handlers for user input on the text input field's editor. |
|  [configure\_(config)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.configure__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [doClassValidation\_(opt\_newValue)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.doclassvalidation__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Ensure that the input value casts to a valid string. |
|  [doValueInvalid\_(\_invalidValue)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.dovalueinvalid__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Called by setValue if the text input is not valid. If the field is currently being edited it reverts value of the field to the previous value while allowing the display text to be handled by the htmlInput\_. |
|  [doValueUpdate\_(newValue)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.dovalueupdate__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Called by setValue if the text input is valid. Updates the value of the field, and updates the text of the field if it is not currently being edited (i.e. handled by the htmlInput\_). |
|  [getEditorText\_(value)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.geteditortext__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Transform the provided value into a text to show in the HTML input. Override this method if the field's HTML input representation is different than the field's value. This should be coupled with an override of <code>getValueFromEditorText_</code>. |
|  [getText\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.gettext__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Use the <code>getText_</code> developer hook to override the field's text representation. When we're currently editing, return the current HTML value instead. Otherwise, return null which tells the field to use the default behaviour (which is a string cast of the field's value). |
|  [getValueFromEditorText\_(text)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.getvaluefromeditortext__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Transform the text received from the HTML input into a value to store in this field. Override this method if the field's HTML input representation is different than the field's value. This should be coupled with an override of <code>getEditorText_</code>. |
|  [isTabNavigable()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.istabnavigable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether or not the field is tab navigable. |
|  [onFinishEditing\_(\_value)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.onfinishediting__1_method.md) |  | A callback triggered when the user is done editing the field via the UI. |
|  [onHtmlInputKeyDown\_(e)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.onhtmlinputkeydown__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Handle key down to the editor. |
|  [render\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.render__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the colour of the htmlInput given the current validity of the field's value. |
|  [resizeEditor\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.resizeeditor__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Resize the editor to fit the text. |
|  [setEditorValue\_(newValue)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.seteditorvalue__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Set the HTML input value and the field's internal value. The difference between this and <code>setValue</code> is that this also updates the HTML input value whilst editing. |
|  [setSpellcheck(check)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.setspellcheck_1_method.md) |  | Set whether this field is spellchecked by the browser. |
|  [showEditor\_(\_opt\_e, opt\_quietInput)](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.showeditor__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Show the inline free-text editor on top of the text. |
|  [unbindInputEvents\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.unbindinputevents__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Unbind handlers for user input and workspace size changes. |
|  [widgetCreate\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.widgetcreate__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create the text input editor widget. |
|  [widgetDispose\_()](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.widgetdispose__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Closes the editor, saves the results, and disposes of any events or DOM-references belonging to the editor. |
